title: The Fresh Beat Band Vol 2.0: More Music From The Hit TV Show
description: Emmy Award Winner and the 2011 Parents Choice Award for Television, Nickelodeons The Fresh Beat Band centers on four best friends Kiki, Marina, Twist, and Shout in a band who love to sing and dance. In each episode, preschoolers sing and dance and gain music appreciation as they help The Fresh Beat Band solve everyday challenges. The Fresh Beat Band is gearing up for the second leg of their nationwide tour which kicks off Aug. 23rd in Melbourne, FL and will wrap up on Nov. 24th in Los Angeles. The high-energy, interactive, nearly sold out tour will include hits from seasons one, two, and three as well as brand new tunes, and will play 75 shows in 62 cities across the USA!
